featured.text: A slave raid starts with an assembly of the Amazon warriors outside their own nest.
they seize the pupae of the raided nest.

definition.zh_def: 突襲；襲擊，通常是為了攻擊或掠奪。
definition.en_def: A sudden attack or incursion into a place, typically to steal or cause damage.
definition.example: The police conducted a raid on the suspected drug house.
